definition: to melt (metal)/to cancel or annul/to sell/to spend/to fasten with a bolt/bolt or pin

sentences.english: The new products will first be put on trial sale in this city.
sentences.chinese: 這種新產品將在本市先行試銷。

sentences.english: I give as a trial order Quantity in 20Ft Cont.
sentences.chinese: 我將定購以20英尺集裝箱包裝的數量試銷。

sentences.english: All products will be given sample trial selling at factory price.
sentences.chinese: 所有產品，我們可以按出廠價給您提供樣版試銷。

sentences.english: What does the test marketing show?
